title: Protection from Energy
content:
m Energy:Fire Until Long RestMeleeConcentration Grant the target Resistance to Fire damage. Protection from Energy:Cold Until Long RestMeleeConcentration Grant the target Resistance to Cold damage. Protection from Energy:Acid Until Long RestMeleeConcentration Grant the target Resistance to Acid damage.

Protection from Energy: Thunder

Until Long RestMeleeConcentration
